name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Dynamic Full Stack Developer with 13+ years of experience, adept at crafting APIs and RESTful services while effectively utilizing JSON and XML formats. Proven capability in providing technical support and collaborating with cross-functional teams to drive successful outcomes in the healthcare and financial industries. Proficient in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with comprehensive experience in frontend and backend frameworks including **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, and **Node.js**, as well as **FastAPI** and **Django** for robust application development.

Skilled in leveraging **AWS** and **Azure** for cloud-native deployment, implementing microservices, and orchestrating CI/CD pipelines. Expertise in developing AI/ML solutions that enable predictive analytics and automation. Committed to compliance-driven development in alignment with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Strong foundational skills in MLOps, including orchestration of model training and serving through **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
Adept at problem-solving and fostering effective communication to enhance collaboration across technical and non-technical stakeholders.
